attributes.title: Absolutely horrible!!
attributes.review: I was getting on the app to see what he has planned for America. But what I saw terrifying🤮! It was trump’s face🤢🤢. Everything about the app was horrible and what he was doing was dumb! If you vote for this man your moms a ho😙! 👁👄👁.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP it’s took two weeks to download and I had perfect WiFi and when It downloaded my phone got really really glitchy I could barely use it thanks a lot Trump 🤬 🍊

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is terrible it takes a long time to download it not only that I keeps crashing and it gave my phone a virus🤬

attributes.title: This app was terrible
attributes.review: This app wouldn’t work at all. It made my phone glitch and I couldn’t get anything else to work all because of this app.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE !!!
attributes.review: The app lags so much and gives me a bad time trying to reach the good stuff like DO NOT download the app!!! ITS SO BADDDD it lags so much and doesn’t help u at all, it just makes you dumber each minute you’re on it! BIG NO NO FOR ME

attributes.title: The worst app ever!!😡😡
attributes.review: When I opened it I found these oranges on my ground(I don’t like oranges) so I threw them out of my house!🍊🍊 every time I open the app more oranges came so I just never opened the app again!!!!😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: 1 star for the bad vibes alone
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever seen, all I wanted to do was help my Cheeto president stay in office and support him! This app gave me AIDS😤😤😤 wth bro!!! I’m trying to help your old wrinkly self out and your app gives me aids! #canceled

attributes.title: BLACK LIVES MATTER ❤️
attributes.review:
yea but chile this app made my phone lag sooo bad. i wasn’t able to play games, open other apps, and the app made my airpods EXPLODE !!! so now i am forced to buy a new pair 🥺. then once it finally downloaded, it sent a virus to my macbook that i just got , so now i have to buy ANOTHER apple device. i’m gonna go broke because of this app , such a horrible experience 🥺. 

-sent from my apple watch 🥺
#BLACKLIVESMATTER
#ABOLISHICE

#FTRUMP

attributes.title: I was I could leave zero stars
attributes.review: The app is incapable of telling the truth. I swear I get Cheeto dust on my fingers every time I open it (it was one time. I don’t like Cheeto dust on my fingers) -10/10 do not recommend.

attributes.title: Doesn’t work
attributes.review: Downloaded this back in 2016 and it really hasn’t done anything yet... just kinda sits there and loads likes it has nothing good to say or offer. Weird.
